description: Visualise device data of a Fibaro Home Center 2, by Ben Pannier - grafana@ka.ro

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "variable" WHERE "variable" = 'alarm' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter
SELECT SUM(last) FROM (SELECT last("value") FROM "dead" WHERE "device" =~ /^$dead$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device")
SELECT sum("value") FROM "water" WHERE "device" =~ /^$water$/ AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "tamper" WHERE "device" =~ /^$tamper$/ AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum(last) from (SELECT last("value") FROM "energy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP by "device")
SELECT distinct("value") FROM "temperature" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$temp$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "diagnostics" WHERE "device" = 'HC2' AND "what" = 'storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Dead
list.name: dead
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dead" WITH KEY = "device"

list.label: Temperature
list.name: temp
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "temperature" WITH KEY = "device"

list.name: therm
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "thermostat" WITH KEY = "device"

list.name: motion
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "motion" WITH KEY = "device"

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "door" WITH KEY = "device"

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tamper" WITH KEY = "device"

list.label: Energy
list.name: energy
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "energy" WITH KEY = "device"

list.label: Storage Type
list.name: stType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diagnostics" WITH KEY = "type" WHERE  "what" = 'storage'

list.label: Storages
list.name: stName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diagnostics" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE  "what" = 'storage' AND "type" =~ /^$stType/

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diagnostics" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE  "what" = 'cpu'

title: Appartment
